Who should book this checkup?: Women between 15-60 years of age are prone to develop skin problems due to various  reasons including exposure to pollutants, chemicals, cosmetics , hormonal imbalances, lack of sleep and balanced diet. This skincare checkup will screen you for  common health conditions such as thyroid dysfunction, poor immunity or infections, anemia, vitamin and mineral deficiencies and diabetes which can cause skin problems.
